about_the_game:
Lottery Winner is a simulation game about buying lottery. You can experience spending money buying as much lottery as you want and test if you are lucky to win the first prize.

Experience lottery games from 2 countries

China
Including Super Lottery and 7 Star Lottery Game

Australia
Including Powerball and OZ Lotto

The game has the same design, rule and prize as they are in real life.

Buy as much lottery as you want!

If you ever imagined you could win a first prize of a lottery, why not try to test your luck in the game with 0 cost?
In the game, you could choose infinite mode to withdraw unlimited money from the bank. So that you can buy any lottery at any amount.
This is a fun way to examine your math theory or just your luck.

Statistic

Inside game statistic will tell you how much you spend and how much you win in total. You can also check the prize infomation in the result.

name: Lottery Winner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 9600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 12700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Lottery Winner is a simulation game that reflect lottery games in real life. You can buy as much lottery as you want to examine your lottery theory or just your luck.
